Conversation/InstallerText/Group00001=安裝程式 - 文字 /// Installer Text
Conversation/InstallerText/Line00001=幾個世紀之前，四艘押犯人的船從地球改變航道前往克普魯星區。他們迫降在塔桑尼斯、莫瑞亞和尤摩捷行星上。 /// Centuries ago four prison ships from Earth veered off course and journeyed deep into the remote Koprulu sector. There they crash-landed on the planets of Tarsonis, Moria, and Umoja.
Conversation/InstallerText/Line00002=與地球斷絕音訊的倖存者在星區內開拓殖民地。最大的一個殖民地，塔桑尼斯，是由強大卻專制的政府泰倫聯邦所建立的。 /// Cut off from Earth, the survivors established colonies throughout the sector. The largest, Tarsonis, was founded by a powerful yet increasingly oppressive government called the Confederacy.
Conversation/InstallerText/Line00003=在這個政府殘暴行為的驅使下，阿克圖洛斯‧蒙斯克組成了克哈之子來進行推翻聯邦並解放克普魯星區的行動。 /// Spurred by the terrible acts of this government, Arcturus Mengsk formed the Sons of Korhal. This rebel army fought to overthrow the Confederacy and liberate the Koprulu sector.
Conversation/InstallerText/Line00004=就在蒙斯克和他的反抗軍與腐敗的聯邦作戰的同時，人類面臨了更大的威脅。 /// Even as Mengsk and his resistance fighters fought to overthrow the corrupt Confederacy, a much greater threat confronted the terrans.
Conversation/InstallerText/Line00005=在毫無預警的狀態下，大批的外星艦隊包圍了聯邦的喬‧薩拉行星。他們自稱為神族，將行星化為焦土後神祕地消失無蹤。 /// Without warning, massive alien warships appeared and surrounded the Confederate planet of Chau Sara. Calling themselves protoss, the aliens incinerated the planet's surface and then mysteriously withdrew.
Conversation/InstallerText/Line00006=這顆行星被另一種外星生物所佔據：蟲族。神族嘗試在這些怪物般的生物佔據人類星球之前將蟲族一舉消滅。 /// The planet had been infested by another type of alien: the zerg. These monstrous creatures threatened to overwhelm terran space, and the protoss sought to eradicate them before they spread.
Conversation/InstallerText/Line00007=蟲族的魔爪已經伸向鄰近的行星瑪而‧薩拉，聯邦政府在異形的威脅下遺棄了他們。而吉姆‧雷諾警長則盡力拯救被嚇壞的殖民地居民。 /// The zerg had already reached the neighboring planet, Mar Sara, and Marshal Jim Raynor fought to save the terrified colonists as the Confederate government abandoned them to the alien menace.
Conversation/InstallerText/Line00008=克哈之子介入了戰爭，從肆虐的蟲族和神祕的神族手下救出了數以千計的人民。對聯邦徹底唾棄的雷諾加入了叛軍並遇見了莎拉‧凱莉根。 /// The Sons of Korhal intervened, saving thousands of lives from the rampaging zerg and enigmatic protoss. Disgusted by the Confederacy, Raynor joined the rebels and met Sarah Kerrigan.
Conversation/InstallerText/Line00009=凱莉根原本是聯邦的幽靈特務，她與雷諾都渴望著解放克普魯星區。與聯邦的戰爭擴大的同時，兩人的感情也越漸深厚。 /// Kerrigan was a former Confederate ghost operative, and she shared Raynor's desire for a liberated Koprulu sector. They grew close as the battle with the Confederacy escalated.
Conversation/InstallerText/Line00010=但是蒙斯克的仇恨和野心過度地膨脹了。他命令將裝置放在聯邦的主星塔桑尼斯以引誘蟲族，使得塔桑尼斯的居民因而滅絕。 /// But Mengsk went too far in his hatred and ambition. He ordered devices placed on the Confederate capital world of Tarsonis to lure the zerg and annihilate the population.
Conversation/InstallerText/Line00011=率領神族的執行官塔薩達決定要幫助人類擊敗蟲族，而非將星球上的生命全數淨化。蒙斯克派遣了凱莉根來阻止塔薩達介入此事。 /// The protoss, led by Executor Tassadar, decided to help the Terrans defeat the zerg instead of purging the planet of life. Mengsk sent Kerrigan to stop Tassadar's interference.
Conversation/InstallerText/Line00012=在凱莉根與神族作戰的同時，蟲族殺光了塔桑尼斯上面的居民。在達成他的目標之後，蒙斯克離開了那裡，任由外星種族俘虜凱莉根。 /// With Kerrigan battling the protoss, the zerg overwhelmed Tarsonis and decimated the population. Having achieved his goals, Mengsk left the planet and abandoned Kerrigan to the aliens.
Conversation/InstallerText/Line00013=背叛一事使得雷諾徹底唾棄蒙斯克，並離開克哈之子。為了救回凱莉根，他趕往行星地表，然而一切為時已晚：她已不知所蹤。 /// Sickened by Mengsk's treachery, Raynor quit the Sons of Korhal. He raced to the planet's surface to save Kerrigan, but was too late: no trace of her remained.
Conversation/InstallerText/Line00014=在摧毀聯邦之後，蒙斯克自行稱帝並組成了泰倫自治聯盟，往後證實了這是一個與前政府同樣腐敗的政權。 /// Having destroyed the Confederacy, Mengsk crowned himself emperor of the newly formed Terran Dominion; a government that would prove to be just as corrupt as its predecessor.
Conversation/InstallerText/Line00015=失去凱莉根的雷諾哀痛不已，並發誓要為她報仇。不過他並不知道，其實蟲族並沒有殺死凱莉根，而是將她帶到了遍佈火山的查爾行星上。 /// Raynor mourned the loss of Kerrigan and vowed revenge. Unbeknownst to him, however, the zerg hadn't killed Kerrigan. Instead, they took her to the volcanic planet of Char.
Conversation/InstallerText/Line00016=在查爾，凱莉根被轉化為異形般的刀鋒女皇。她得到了強大的幽能力量，對統治蟲群的主宰忠心不貳。 /// On Char, Kerrigan was transformed into the alien Queen of Blades. She became a being of immense psionic power, loyal to the Overmind, ruler of the zerg Swarm.
Conversation/InstallerText/Line00017=除了塔薩達的軍隊之外，另一個神族的派系從暗影之中嶄露頭角。澤拉圖和他的黑暗聖堂武士要透過秘密的行動和虛空幽能來終止蟲族的擴張。 /// Separate from Tassadar's forces, another protoss faction emerged from the shadows. Zeratul and his dark templar sought to end the zerg expansion through stealth and the power of the Void.
Conversation/InstallerText/Line00018=兩支神族的軍隊為了對抗蟲族而攜手合作，但是主宰卻發現了他們的秘密母星艾爾。蟲族很快地開始入侵，主宰也將自己深植在行星的地表。 /// The two protoss forces joined together against the Swarm, but the Overmind was able to discover their secret homeworld of Aiur. The zerg quickly invaded, and the Overmind embedded itself in the planet's surface.
Conversation/InstallerText/Line00019=澤拉圖教導了塔薩達如何讓自身力量與虛空幽能相結合。塔薩達將那些能量傳導到自己的船上，並撞向巨大的主宰，將牠徹底地毀滅。 /// Zeratul taught Tassadar how to combine his powers with those of the Void.  Tassadar fused those energies into his ship, and crashed it into the gargantuan Overmind, destroying it utterly.
Conversation/InstallerText/Line00020=儘管塔薩達作出如此的犧牲，艾爾的神族仍被迫逃往黑暗聖堂武士的主星夏庫拉斯。在主宰被消滅以後，由凱莉根取得了蟲族的控制權。 /// Despite Tassadar's sacrifice, the protoss on Aiur were forced to seek refuge on the dark templar homeworld of Shakuras. With the Overmind destroyed, Kerrigan assumed control of the zerg.
Conversation/InstallerText/Line00021=雷諾開始對獨裁的自治聯盟進行反抗。為了反擊，蒙斯克使用了他最強大的武器 - 宣導 - 將雷諾的努力邊緣化，將他抹黑成恐怖份子。 /// Raynor began a resistance movement against the oppressive Dominion. In retaliation, Mengsk deployed his greatest weapon -- propaganda -- to marginalize Raynor's efforts and paint him as a terrorist.
Conversation/InstallerText/Line00022=現在四年已經過去了。凱莉根和蟲族靜得令人感到不安。同時，自治聯盟的力量不斷增長，它的影響力遍及克普魯星區。 /// It is now four years later. Kerrigan and the zerg have remained ominously silent. Meanwhile, the Dominion has grown in power and extended its influence throughout the Koprulu sector.
Conversation/InstallerText/Line00023=雷諾和他的部隊，在士氣低迷和資源缺乏的雙重打擊下，持續反抗著自治聯盟的統治。而打敗蒙斯克的這個希望，隨著時間過去越來越渺小... /// Raynor and his forces, plagued by low morale and lack of resources, continue their struggle against the Dominion. Victory against Mengsk, however, seems more distant than ever....

Conversation/TZeratul02Briefing/Line00002=解讀預言的任務帶領我來到了文庫禁地 -- 扎庫行星。 /// My quest to decipher the prophecy took me to the forbidden archive world of Zhakul.
Conversation/TZeratul02Briefing/Line00003=只有他們能翻譯預言的碎片。我必須儘快的找到他們。 /// Only they could transcribe the prophetic fragments. I needed to seek them out quickly.
Conversation/TZeratul02Briefing/Line00004=這裡有三名不朽守護者守護著遠古知識。 /// Here, three immortal Preservers guarded ancient knowledge.
Conversation/TZeratul03/Comment00001=澤拉圖殺死一個觸角之後...威力提升！ /// After Zeratul kills one - power up!
Conversation/TZeratul03/Comment00002=澤拉圖啟動傳送門。某一些神族單位從能量基網現身。 /// Zeratul activates the waygate. A number of protoss units emerge from its energy matrix. 
Conversation/TZeratul03/Comment00003=一支巨像小隊抵達。它們真壯觀。 /// A squad of colossi arrive. They are magnificent. 
Conversation/TZeratul03/Comment00004=鏡頭切換至一個預先建造的蟲族蟲苔區。我們處於濃厚的陰影中。在強烈的紅光下，可以看到幾隻蟲族幼蟲在附近的泥漿中爬行著。 /// The camera cuts away to a pre-built zerg creep-out area. We are in heavy shadow. In the HEAVY RED LIGHT we see a few zerg larvae creeping around in the muck. 
Conversation/TZeratul03/Comment00005=我們看見幼蟲進入蟲蛹狀態。 ///  We see the larva enter its egg state. 
Conversation/TZeratul03/Comment00006=我們看見蟲卵爆裂，異化蟲紛紛爬出，嗅著空氣的味道（或其他表情之類的）。 ///  We see the egg explode as a zerglings crawls out. It sniffs the air (or emotes somehow).   
Conversation/TZeratul03/Comment00007=另一批異化蟲追趕在第一批身後，衝越過螢幕。 /// A wave of additional zerglings race up behind the first one and charge across the screen. 
Conversation/TZeratul03/Comment00008=當鏡頭向上平移圍繞著蟲群生物時，第一批異化蟲做出表情後，便開始跟它們一起奔跑。 ///  The first zerglings emotes and then starts running with them as the camera pans up and around the swarming creatures. 
Conversation/TZeratul03/Comment00009=幻象結束...鏡頭切換至澤拉圖站在觸角點附近。 /// The visions ends... we cut back to Zeratul standing near the tendril node.
Conversation/TZeratul03/Comment00010=鏡頭切換至太空景象。穿過強烈紅光看去，可以看到一群蟲族空中單位緩緩地飛過星空。鏡頭繞著牠們平移 - 盡顯蟲族的異形優美和壯麗。 /// The camera cuts away to a view of SPACE. Through HEAVY RED LIGHT we see a swarm of zerg flyers moving slowly across a star field. The camera pans around them - showing their alien grace and majesty as a swarm. 
Conversation/TZeratul03/Comment00011=鏡頭左右搖晃顯示蟲群後方的太空...在那我們看見在它們身後的死亡世界...可以是2D - 灰色/無色彩 - 或在燃燒 （隨便）... 我們想要顯示蟲群巨大的破壞力。 /// Camera swings around to show the space BEHIND this swarm... there we see DEAD WORLDS behind them... Could be 2D - gray/lifeless - or aflame (whatever)... we want to show the swarm as hugely destructive.
Conversation/TZeratul03/Comment00012=鏡頭切換至新畫面，顯示一個蟲洞在蟲群前方緩緩地打開（類似星海爭霸1裡面<n/>蟲族勝利動畫檔 - 這將用到聖母艦的「黑洞」技能特效）。蟲族「被扯進」黑洞中，<n/>彷彿在利用蟲洞進行傳送... ///  The camera cuts to show a worm-hole SLOWLY open up before the swarm (similar to the Zerg victory flic <n/>in Star1 - this will use the 'black hole' Mothership spell art). The zerg 'get pulled in' to the black hole as if <n/>using it as a wormhole for travel...
Conversation/TZeratul03/Comment00013=所有蟲族都透過蟲洞進行「傳送」 - 只留下眼前沉寂的星空。場景開始轉成一片黑。 /// All the zerg 'teleport' through the wormhole - leaving only silent stars before us. The scene starts to go black. 
Conversation/TZeratul03/Comment00014=鏡頭切換至澤拉圖站在觸角節點前。 ///  Camera cuts back to Zeratul as he stands before the tendril node. 
Conversation/TZeratul03/Comment00015=鏡頭切換至「蟲室」- 一個充滿蟲苔、一堆紅色強光和陰影的暗室...鏡頭緩緩地平移一圈...可以聽見強烈的心跳聲迴盪整個房間。 /// The camera cuts away to a zerg 'room' - a dark chamber covered with CREEP. HEAVY RED LIGHT and shadow... the camera slowly pans around the room... A strong heartbeat is heard echoing throughout the chamber.
Conversation/TZeratul03/Comment00016=鏡頭止於房間中央 - 此時我們看到一個蟲蛹（與星海1的類似）。 /// Camera stops tracking at the center of the room - as we see a CHRYSALIS (similar to Star1). 
Conversation/TZeratul03/Comment00017=鏡頭開始朝蟲蛹拉近。 ///  Camera starts zooming in towards the chrysalis. 
Conversation/TZeratul03/Comment00018=蟲蛹開始扭曲伸展 - 彷彿有東西想將其扯裂、掙脫出來。心跳聲加快 - 響如雷鳴。 /// The chrysalis begins to warp and flex - something is tearing its way out. The heartbeat is faster - thundering now. 
Conversation/TZeratul03/Comment00019=我們看到凱莉根從蟲蛹中升起。鏡頭慢慢地繞著她的形體平移 - 展示其尊貴不凡的女皇氣勢。 ///  We see KERRIGAN arise from the Chrysalis. The camera slowly pans around her form - revealing her majesty. 
Conversation/TZeratul03/Comment00020=我們看見大量蟲族朝她衝去 - 群擁牠們的新女皇。鏡頭切換至澤拉圖。 ///  We see tons of zerg rushing at her - swarming around her as their new queen. Camera cuts back to Zeratul.
Conversation/TZeratul03/Comment00021=澤拉圖進入並看見...塔薩達。 /// Zeratul enters and sees... Tassadar.
Conversation/TZeratul03/Comment00022=當戰鬥變險惡時，鏡頭往下平移至場景。可以看到星梭號飛行在畫面上，像在作簡報。 /// The camera pans down to the scenes as the combat gets nasty. We see GANTRITHOR flying on-screen as in the BRIEFING. 
Conversation/TZeratul03/Comment00023=當戰鬥變險惡時，鏡頭往下平移至場景。可以看到星梭號飛行在畫面上，像在作簡報。 /// The camera pans down to the scenes as the combat gets nasty. We see GANTRITHOR flying on-screen as in the BRIEFING.

Conversation/TZeratul03/Comment00032=獲得新單位：巨像是強力的對地兵器，但無法抵抗空中單位的攻擊。它們能行走於山崖之間。 /// New unit acquired -  Colossi are strong against ground based forces but vulnerable to air units. They have the ability to walk up and down cliffs.

Conversation/TZeratul03/Line00006=蟲族認為我們是牠們死亡主人的威脅！ /// The zerg perceive a threat to their dead master!
Conversation/TZeratul03/Line00007=啊！我聽過有關於偉大巨像關在艾爾下面的故事！蟲族的侵略一定喚醒了這些可怕的守護者！ /// Ah! I've heard tales of the mighty colossi sealed away beneath Aiur! The beacon must have awoken these fearsome guardians!

Conversation/TZeratul03/Line00015=第二個觸角點！我必須馬上開始接觸！ /// The second tendril node! I must make contact quickly!

Conversation/TZeratul03/Line00017=我被薩爾納加的奧祕操縱所指使...去尋找並同化他們最早孕育出...且令他們失望的後裔...神族。 /// I was driven by the deepest manipulations of the Xel'Naga - to find and assimilate their first born...their failed children...the protoss.
Conversation/TZeratul03/Line00018=我對薩爾納加來說只不過是個工具罷了...蟲族是可以將它們萬惡的證據吞噬掉的熊熊烈火。 /// I was nothing more than an instrument to the Xel'Naga...The Swarm was the raging fire that would consume the evidence of their sins.
Conversation/TZeratul03/Line00019=但我的孩子怎麼辦？難道他們沒有自己的未來嗎？ /// But what of my children? Would they have no future of their own?
Conversation/TZeratul03/Line00020=主宰看起來幾乎是...無私的。我必須再繼續前進。 /// The Overmind seemed almost... selfless. I must press on. 
Conversation/TZeratul03/Line00021=終於！第三個觸點！ /// The third node at last! 
Conversation/TZeratul03/Line00022=薩爾納加創造我來消滅讓他們失望的子嗣 - 神族 - 這是一場沒有任何種族能活下來的戰爭。 /// The Xel'Naga had created me to eradicate their failed children - the protoss - in a battle neither species would survive.
Conversation/TZeratul03/Line00023=我什麼都不能做...只能服從。 /// I could do nothing...but obey.
Conversation/TZeratul03/Line00024=我認為純一的蟲群比我更加重要，甚至超出了創物者皮洛客所預見的景象。我將會生出...一個繼承者。 /// Yet I deemed the purity of the Swarm was greater than my function - greater even than the Creators' Pyrrhic vision. I would birth...an inheritor.
Conversation/TZeratul03/Line00025=一個願意給蟲群自由的人。 /// One who would give the Swarm its freedom.
Conversation/TZeratul03/Line00026=並且幫助它...進化。 /// And help it to...evolve.
Conversation/TZeratul03/Line00027=凱莉根。主宰創造她該不會是...為了阻止薩爾納加的歸來吧？ /// Kerrigan. (beat) Could the Overmind have created her... to stop the Xel'Naga's return? 
Conversation/TZeratul03/Line00028=最後一個觸手點...神啊，請賜予我答案。 /// The final tendril node... Gods, grant me the answers I seek. 
Conversation/TZeratul03/Line00029=如命中所註定，我掀起了與初生者的戰爭。 /// I made my war against the first born as I was destined to.
Conversation/TZeratul03/Line00030=在我能夠同化神族之前，我就被消滅了。 /// Before I could assimilate the protoss - I was undone.
Conversation/TZeratul03/Line00031=然而我的...女兒...存活下來了。她獨力一人就能打破這輪迴。她將打造一個沒有薩爾納加的未來。 /// Yet my...daughter...remained. She alone would break the cycle. She alone would forge a future devoid of the hated Xel'Naga.
Conversation/TZeratul03/Line00032=她將獨自帶領蟲族邁向...未來。 /// She alone would lead the Swarm ...into tomorrow.
Conversation/TZeratul03/Line00033=我不敢相信我所見到的。這真是個天大的諷刺...那個可悲的刀鋒女皇...是所有生物存活下來的關鍵。 /// I can scarcely believe what I have seen. What terrible irony - that the wretched Queen of Blades... is the key to saving all who live. 
Conversation/TZeratul03/Line00034=蟲族大軍接近中！ /// The zerg are coming!

Conversation/TZeratul03/Line00037=如果我們善用觀察者，那麼我們就可以降低許多風險。 /// If we use our Observers wisely, we can scout the area before putting ourselves at risk.
Conversation/TZeratul03/Line00038=蟲族想要淹沒我們的基地！兄弟們！準備戰鬥！ /// The zerg seek to overwhelm us! To arms, my brethren!
Conversation/TZeratul03/Line00039=巨像對蟲族的地面部隊有強大的攻擊力，但他們必須免於受到空中單位，像是飛螳的威脅。 /// The colossi are mighty foes against the zerg on the ground, but I fear they will need protection against airborne threats such as mutalisks.
Conversation/TZeratul03/Line00040=啊，這忠心的觀察者自從撤退後就一直替我們監視。它現在確實證明了自己的用處。 /// Ah, this faithful Observer has kept watch since the evacuation. Its abilities will certainly prove useful now.
Conversation/TZeratul03/Line00041=這個古老的信標還存在著些許的能量。我在想... /// This ancient beacon still thrums with power. I wonder...
Conversation/TZeratul03/Line00042=我們的基地被影子籠罩著...蟲族很快將發動攻擊。 /// Our base falls under a shadow -- the zerg will attack soon.
Conversation/TZeratul03/Line00043=我必須找到建立據點的方法，召喚援軍壓制蟲族！ /// I must find a way to establish a foothold and summon reinforcements to keep the zerg at bay!
Conversation/TZeratul03/Line00044=有些廢棄的建築還是可以運作...我們應該善加利用它們。 /// Some of these abandoned structures remain functional... we shall make use of them.
Conversation/TZeratul03/Line00045=我們必須做好防禦基地的準備，蟲族已經開始行動了。 /// We must be prepared to defend our base. The zerg are on the move.
Conversation/TZeratul03/Line00046=主宰的第一根觸角！ /// The first Overmind tendril!
Conversation/TZeratul03/Line00047=我感覺到了...痛苦、驚恐、死亡。 /// I sense... pain. Surprise. Death.
Conversation/TZeratul03/Line00048=主宰的第二根觸角。我感覺到了...死亡...和快樂？ /// The second Overmind tendril. I sense... death... and joy?

Conversation/TZeratul03/Line00050=主宰的第四根觸角。我感覺到了...一個結束。我必須到主宰的外皮質那裡才能理解。 /// The fourth Overmind tendril. I sense... an end. I must go to the Overmind Cortex to understand.

ConversationState/Hotspots/ArmoryMedivac/Info/Description=綽號「修女」的瑪麗亞‧什拉絲是早期的資深醫療艇駕駛員，曾拯救了數百條生命。她後來因為殺了兩名傳聞堅持將醫療艇稱為「醫療巴士」的陸戰隊員，而遭到警方逮捕。<n/><n/>謠言指出她被「重新社會化」，現正愉快地為自治聯盟的軍隊效力中。 /// Maria "Mother" Thalasses was an early medivac pilot, credited with saving hundreds of lives. She later murdered two marines who reportedly insisted on referring to the medivac as a "heal bus." <n/><n/>She is rumored to be resocialized and serving happily in the Dominion military.
ConversationState/Hotspots/ArmoryMedivac/Info/Description 2=第19陸戰師的醫護兵們當初臨時起意，將運輸艇改裝成醫療艇，好讓她們可以在瑟隆七號星的強酸風爆期間待在船內進行遠端操控。這使得醫護兵的平均壽命提高了幾十分鐘。 /// Medics of the 19th Dominion Marine Division first improvised the medivac by modifying a dropship to allow remote control during the acid storms on Thalon VII. This added tens of minutes to the life expectancy of medics.
ConversationState/Hotspots/ArmoryMedivac/Info/Description 3=陸戰隊員們仍舊不相信外科手術雷射的準確度，並對自動縫合的精確度也抱著不樂觀的態度，而這兩項技術都是由贏得最低招標的恆星工業所研發的。 /// Marines still do not trust the accuracy of the scalpel laser, nor are they optimistic about the precision of the auto-suture, both of which were developed by Procyon Industries, the lowest bidder.

ConversationState/Hotspots/ArmorySiegeTank/Info/Description=溫德爾‧施洛芬，一名早期的庫希歐坦克駕駛員，在他「愛騎」的操作系統中安裝了環繞立體音效。施洛芬中士後來因為無法聽到撤退命令，而被敵人攔截並包圍。 /// Wendell Slovens, an early Crucio operator, installed a sophisticated surround-sound system into his "ride." Sgt. Slovens was subsequently cut off and surrounded when he failed to hear the order to fall back.
ConversationState/Hotspots/ArmorySiegeTank/Info/Description 2=裝備了90毫米雙管加農砲，庫希歐為之前的弧光攻城坦克的升級版，為此投入了大量的資金。180毫米「攻城模式」衝擊加農砲所發射的高熱鎢合金砲彈的攻擊距離提升了50%。 /// Armed with twin 90mm cannons, the Crucio is an expensive upgrade to the original Arclite siege tank. The 180mm "siege mode" shock cannon scatters superheated tungsten in a 50% larger area.
ConversationState/Hotspots/ArmorySiegeTank/Info/Description 3=自治聯盟的步兵們一致公認庫希歐坦克的駕駛員們對友軍比對敵軍造成的傷害還要大。結果，庫希歐駕駛員們只好在休假期間一同攜手出遊。 /// Dominion infantry soldiers are universally convinced that Crucio operators inflict more damage on friendly forces than on the enemy. Consequently, Crucio operators stick together during shore leave.

Tell me: you ever see a spectre? No? Because they don't exist."<n/><n/>--Gabriel Tosh, rumored to be the first spectre, speaking to Cyb Roche of the Umojan News Service. Ms. Roche disappeared a week later and has not been seen since.
ConversationState/Hotspots/ArmorySpectreCrates/Info/Description 2=非人般的嚴格訓練所延伸的副作用便是幽魂古怪的個性。許多幽魂都會隨身帶著圖騰或飾品來「強化」他們的能力。 /// A side effect of the spectre training regimen is a marked increase in eccentricity. Many spectres carry totems or other trinkets to "enhance" their abilities.

Terran marines are famously mistrustful of the spider mines' IFF sensors.

Few pilots can master both forms of the vehicle. A viking pilot is a "cherry" until he's been inside of one during a transformation. The twisting metal can kill less-agile men.<n/><n/>The elite few who make it through training are so deadly that their names are well-known by both allies and enemies across the sector.

ConversationState/Hotspots/LabTubeProtoss/Info/Description=<s val="Lab_Text">2504年7月10號，雷諾的突擊隊回收了神族「水晶」樣本。<n/><n/>我將水晶存放於鹽溶液中。它的密度在過去的12小時中已經增長了553%。它是從哪裡獲得能量或原料進行成長的？我不安地懷疑這或許...或許與這艘戰艦有關。如果史汪開始懷疑，他一定會把它從氣閘丟出去，那會是一場悲劇。這個樣本可以為突擊隊帶來驚人的突破。<n/><n/>我只要多加小心就好了，如果出現任何會危害海伯利昂號的徵兆，我會親自動手摧毀它。</s> /// <s val="Lab_Text">Protoss "crystal" sample recovered by Raynor's Raiders, 10.7.2504.<n/><n/>I placed the crystal in saline solution for storage. Its density has increased 553% in the last twelve hours. Where does it get energy or raw materials for that? I have a terrible suspicion that it's... connecting to the ship somehow. If Swann suspects, he'll drop it out the airlock, and that would be a tragedy. This sample could lead to huge breakthroughs for the Raiders.<n/> <n/>I just have to be careful, and if there's any sign that it will harm the Hyperion, I'll destroy the crystal myself.</s>
ConversationState/Hotspots/LabTubeProtoss/Info/Description 2=<s val="Lab_Text">水晶正在成長，看似有某種...反粒子物質？重力反常？異常現象？我現在能肯定水晶的確在吸取戰艦的能源，而且是以一種難以被偵測到的方式。<n/><n/>它不是有機生物，但分子結構的多樣和複雜度與生物不相上下。它發展出了一種複雜的層體使它變得堅固和出人意外的柔韌。混雜了這個水晶物質的合金將會擁有驚人的減傷度。層體的結構也說明了它擁有某種能量儲存系統，但不知是怎樣運作的。<n/><n/>神族的科技對我們來說實在是望塵莫及，我們對他們來說大概就跟阿米巴原蟲一樣吧。</s> /// <s val="Lab_Text">The crystal is growing, and it appears to have something--some sort of... anti-matter? Gravitational anomaly? Non-standard phenomenon?--hovering over it. I'm now convinced that the crystal is drawing power from the ship, but in ways so subtle as to be undetectable. <n/><n/>It is non-organic but has a molecular structure as diverse and complex as any organism's. It's developed an intricate matrix that makes it tough and surprisingly flexible. An alloy based on this crystal would have impressive damage mitigation. The structure of this matrix also suggests some sort of energy-storage system. There might be something to this.<n/><n/>The protoss are so far beyond us. We must seem amoeboid to them.</s>
ConversationState/Hotspots/LabTubeProtoss/Info/Description 3=<s val="Lab_Text">神族的水晶持續的在生長。我不再認為它吸收的是戰艦的能源了。它取得的能量是來自上方的球體。這衍生出另一個問號；它如何運用那些能量？它會釋放能量引起爆炸嗎？我不能讓史汪接近這個樣本，他百分百一定會把它和我綁在一起後，從氣閘丟出去。<n/><n/>我試著想切割下小片的樣本，但所有用過的工具都壞了。好運的是，我在容器中發現了一些浮著的碎片，它們是怎麼脫落的？不管這個，這些碎片讓我得到了更多有關層體的發現。它將能量以漩渦般形式儲藏著。它是如何以這樣高速的狀態移動著能量？這或許跟神族有名的「躍傳」科技有關。在它複雜的結構下，它的層體是最為堅固的。我想...我或許可以將這些技術運用在我們的建築上？把這記錄下來。<n/><n/>我從這水晶身上學到了很多，但我強烈感覺它也從我身上學到了什麼，如果你懂我的意思的話。很晚了，有夠累，要去睡了。</s> /// <s val="Lab_Text">The protoss crystal continues to grow. I no longer think it is drawing power from the ship. It's getting pure energy from that sphere above it, which presents a new worry. What's it doing with all that power? Is it going to release it explosively? I have to keep Swann away from the sample; he will definitely shoot it out the airlock. With me strapped to it.<n/><n/>I tried scraping smaller samples, but all my tools broke. Luckily, I found some cast-off chips floating in the tank. Wonder how they came off? In any case, the chips revealed more of the matrix. It's keeping the energy there in a vortex. How does it move the energy so fast? It may be the fabled protoss warp technology. For all its complexity, the matrix is as solid as the strongest structure. Hm, I wonder if I could apply these dynamics to our own structures? Make a note.<n/><n/>I'm learning so much from this crystal, but I can't help feeling as if it's learning from me, if that makes sense. Late. Tired. Sleep now.</s>
ConversationState/Hotspots/LabTubeProtoss/Info/Description 4=<s val="Lab_Text">我觀察著水晶上方那個奇異的球體。它很明顯的是一個能量放射器，但卻儲藏了如此大量的能量，讓水晶能慢慢的用我無法瞭解的方法吸取能量。這給了我一個靈感：使用我們自身的能量圍阻技術，我可以修改太空工程車的製造步驟，在沒有任何風險下提高兩倍的資源採集率。我是這樣認為的。<n/><n/>重大突破！這個水晶裡的能量並不是以漩渦的形式存在的。它是以我無法偵測到的速度極快地扭曲著周圍的能量。在一次偶然的巧合下，扭曲的速度變得緩慢，剛好讓我的感應器捕捉到它的頻率，原因不明。每次我對這個樣本無能為力時，就會...很巧的...發生某種現象，然後我就可以有所突破。<n/><n/>它是在幫助我嗎？我已經連續工作太多個小時了。我打算到外面玩玩失落的維京戰機，多輸個幾道。</s> /// <s val="Lab_Text">I've been staring at that anomalous sphere above the crystal. It's obviously an energy emitter, but it has such strong containment that the crystal can slowly draw power from it via some method I don't understand. That gives me an idea: using our own containment technology, I could modify our SCV manufacturing process to double capacity with no increased risk. I think.<n/><n/>Breakthrough! The energy in this crystal is not kept in a vortex pattern. It was warping the energy around so fast that I couldn't detect it. In an odd coincidence, the warping slowed just enough for my sensors to pick it up. Not sure how or why. Every time I reach my wits' end with this sample, something happens by... chance... and I get a breakthrough.<n/><n/>Is it helping me? Clearly I've been working too many hours. I'm going to go lose some more credits on Lost Viking.</s>
ConversationState/Hotspots/LabTubeProtoss/Info/Description 5=<s val="Lab_Text">好吧，我的研究可能已經不是現在的科學可以解釋的了，我很確定這個水晶擁有某種...意識，又或...至少擁有某種思考方向。我昨天把一個壞掉的奈米纖維體放進了容器中，今天就被修好了。還有，它可以做出超出想像範圍的事。如果我可以逆轉纖維體的修復過程的話，我就可以研發出驚人的自動化修復技術，甚至以接近瞬間的速度製造高A.I.武器。可能性是無限的。<n/><n/>一則以喜一則以憂，儲存於水晶中的能量等級完全沒有提升，儘管水晶的體積不斷地成長著。所以它一定用某種方法將能量釋放至...某處。</s> /// <s val="Lab_Text">Okay, I may be exceeding the boundaries of good science, but I am now sure this crystal has some sort of... if not sentience, at least... direction. I put a broken nano-fabricator in the tank last night, and today it's fixed.  And it can accomplish things it shouldn't. If I can reverse engineer this fabricator, I could do amazing things with automated repair, or even near-instant manufacturing of advanced AI weaponry. Possibilities are limitless.<n/><n/>On the less upbeat end of things, the level of energy stored in the crystal's matrix has not increased at all, despite the fact that the crystal continues to grow. So it must be emitting that energy somehow, some... where.</s>
ConversationState/Hotspots/LabTubeProtoss/Info/Description 6=<s val="Lab_Text">我透過研究這個水晶而發展出的抑制理論和加固結構完整性定理已經逐漸的...嗯...成形了。我們或許可利用它儲藏原本需要大型設備才可儲藏的能量，又或是製造足以承受由星軌高速著陸所產生的壓力的裝置。<n/><n/>我太丟臉了，到現在還沒從這水晶身上研究出什麼。我只觀察了它微小的細部結構，還有當它願意幫我的時候...看到了一丁點的有趣現象。我不瞭解神族為什麼可以在擁有如此深不可測的科技下卻沒統治這個銀河？是他們不想嗎？<n/><n/>對此樣本的最終記錄。我終於瞭解它把過剩的能量都釋放到哪去了，它在餵食海伯利昂號。它悄悄地在為戰艦充能，平衡了一些出力較低的系統。自從它一到船上後便開始為船艦充能，一直到現在都沒有停過。史汪對於戰艦的運作變得更加順暢感到非常開心，但他自己也不知道為什麼會這樣。我不會跟他說原因的。</s> /// <s val="Lab_Text">All of the containment and reinforced structural integrity theorems I've developed from studying this crystal are starting to... well... crystallize. I think we might be able to contain energies that once required huge machines. Or even manufacture structures capable of hot landings from orbital origins with acceptable stresses.<n/><n/>I'm a sham. I haven't truly learned anything from this crystal. I've just observed the smallest details from it and somehow wrangled a few tidbits when the crystal... helped me. I don't understand how the protoss can possess technology of this magnitude and not rule the known universe. Perhaps they simply don't want to?<n/><n/>Last entry on this sample. I figured out where it is putting all that excess energy. It's feeding the Hyperion. Subtly helping to power the ship, balancing out some of the more ragged systems. It's giving of itself, and has been since it got here. Swann is excited that the ship is running so well, but he has no idea why. And I'm not going to tell him.</s>

ConversationState/Hotspots/LabTubeProtoss/Info/Header 6=<s val="Lab_Title">斯特曼日誌：第2977條記錄</s> /// <s val="Lab_Title">Stetmann Log: Entry 2977</s>
ConversationState/Hotspots/LabTubeZerg=蟲族培養槽 /// Zerg Tank
ConversationState/Hotspots/LabTubeZerg/EditorPrefix=實驗室 - /// Lab -
ConversationState/Hotspots/LabTubeZerg/Info/Description=<s val="Lab_Text">2504年10月6號，由雷諾的突擊隊所回收的蟲族樣本。<n/><n/>樣本剛被運上船的時候似乎已經死亡，組織也已壞死。儘管如此，現在測試顯示了極高的細胞活動，還有它正在扭動。<n/><n/>這推翻了全部我所了解的生物理論。我對各個細胞進行追蹤，發現了它們正在變化。在過去的一小時中，這個東西不斷地進化，速度已超出人類這100,000年所達到的程度。<n/><n/>如果我可以揭開它神秘的面紗的話，將可為突擊隊帶來極大的軍力幫助。</s> /// <s val="Lab_Text">Zerg sample recovered by Raynor's Raiders, 6.10.2504.<n/><n/>Sample appeared dead when brought in, including tissue necrosis. However, tests now reveal frantic cellular activity, and it is moving. <n/><n/>This defies everything I understand about biology. I'm tracking massive generational changes in each cell. In the last hour, this thing has evolved more than humans did in 100,000 years.<n/><n/>If I can harness this, it could lead to huge military innovations for the Raiders.</s>
ConversationState/Hotspots/LabTubeZerg/Info/Description 2=<s val="Lab_Text">回收的蟲族樣本持續成長中。我把它放置在蛋白質溶液中，這或許是個錯誤。<n/><n/>在細胞形成期，樣本顯示了所有已知蟲族的種系染色體，還有許多無法辨識的特徵。解序所有的基因需要花點時間，但我已經開始從雷獸的細胞中取得些資料，也從孢子爬行蟲的細胞中找到了它們對威脅的本能反應行動循環。</s> /// <s val="Lab_Text">The recovered zerg sample is still growing. I introduced a protein solution. Might have been a mistake.<n/><n/>At the cellular level, the sample shows strains of every known zerg creature--and many other strains that I don't recognize. It will take a while to map it all, but I've already begun extracting data from an ultralisk cell, and I found a spore crawler cell that yielded data on its instinctive threat-recognition routines.</s>
ConversationState/Hotspots/LabTubeZerg/Info/Description 3=<s val="Lab_Text">取得的蟲族樣本不斷地在進化，發展出神經皮質層，很明顯的進行著神經活動。它所發出的熱能已遠超過可在培養槽內可吸收的量了。<n/><n/>我瞭解為什麼有些蟲族是遁地高手了，過程非常複雜。它們擁有上億微小的肌肉以低頻率震動著，可以有效的鬆動泥土、震碎岩石或打斷植物。它們可以在地底下「游泳」，無法像奔跑一樣那麼快，但也相差不遠。<n/><n/>這項發現絕對可以加以利用。</s> /// <s val="Lab_Text">Recovered zerg sample continues to evolve. Clearly has motor function despite the lack of anything like a neural cortex. It's giving off more heat than it could possibly be absorbing in that tank.<n/><n/>I'm learning how some zerg burrow so well. It's extremely sophisticated. They have billions of tiny muscles that vibrate at a low frequency, effectively loosening soil, crumbling rock, and snapping vegetation. They can "swim" through the ground. It's not quite as fast as running, but it's close.<n/><n/>I can see a way to put this knowledge to good use.</s>
ConversationState/Hotspots/LabTubeZerg/Info/Description 4=<s val="Lab_Text">蟲族的樣本已經發展出了視覺器官。之後會是四肢嗎？蟲族的細胞重製有著基本的二分法。A 型細胞會隨機的進行各種突變，B 型細胞則獵殺這些突變的細胞並摧毀它們。這是細胞界的適者生存，突變成功和活下來的細胞便代表著進化。<n/><n/>我對樣本使用了顯微切割技術來測試我之前只是隨便玩玩的靜電釋放力場。成果令人非常滿意。測試結果出現了有趣的副作用，蟲族物質發展成了一個密度極高卻柔韌的物質。史汪一直以來都想對那舊型海克力士級的運輸船動手腳，這種物質便可以加強船身主甲板的堅韌度。<n/><n/>我希望時間足夠可以讓我同時進行釋放力場和強化物質的研究，但似乎是不可能的。</s> /// <s val="Lab_Text">The zerg sample has developed an ocular organ. Will limbs be next? There is a basic dichotomy to zerg cell reproduction. Type A cells throw off seemingly random mutations. Type B cells hunt down these mutations and destroy them. It's survival of the fittest on the cellular level. Successful mutations thrive.<n/><n/>I used microscopic scrapings from the sample to test an electrical discharge field I'd been tinkering with for some time. The results were gratifying. As an interesting side effect, the zerg matter developed into a very dense but flexible material. This material could be used to reinforce the superstructure of those old Hercules-class cargo ships that Swann's always trying to find a use for.<n/> <n/>I wish there were time to both pursue the discharge field and iterate on the hardened matter. I doubt there will be.</s>
ConversationState/Hotspots/LabTubeZerg/Info/Description 5=<s val="Lab_Text">蟲族的樣本已經生出了大範圍的神經皮質。我發現了它會根據外界的刺激做出反應，以一種令人不舒服的方式。當它感覺到我的存在時，它便會停止一切動作。它這是在裝死嗎？它已經發展出這樣的智慧了？<n/><n/>我稍早發現了蟲族的α胺基酸擁有獨特的 R 基團。我對此展開了深入研究。得出的結果令人震驚。蟲族的胺基酸可以將死亡的細胞殘骸與一般的蛋白質結合後生物合成出新的細胞。它們不會受到細胞隔代降解的影響。說的白話一點，就是蟲族永遠不會老死。縱使細胞的基本結構發生了變化，它們也可以持續的「自我回復」。<n/><n/>人類絕對不能擁有這項生物技術，不然後果會不堪設想。不過我在想...或許我可以利用蟲族的細胞組織到導入至我們的金屬中讓建築物可以自我治療？副作用是...這種再生的方式同時也需要極高的能量。嗯...看來我要想想如何解決能量的問題。</s> /// <s val="Lab_Text">The zerg sample has developed a large neural cortex. I've noticed it reacting to external stimuli, but in a very disturbing way. When it detects my presence, it stops moving. Is it trying to "play dead"? Can it react at that level?<n/><n/>I noticed earlier that zerg alpha amino acids have unique R groups. I've run a full regimen on some. Results are stunning. Zerg aminos are able to combine dead cell matter with normal proteins to biosynthesize new cells. They don't suffer generational cell degradation. Simply put, a zerg will never die of old age. They can constantly renew themselves, albeit with radically changing cell structure.<n/><n/>We could never harness this for biological use with terrans: the results would be foregone and horrifying. But I wonder if I could alloy zerg tissue with some of our metals to make buildings that heal? The renewal process also throws off immense energy as a byproduct. Something there. I should see about harnessing that energy.</s>
ConversationState/Hotspots/LabTubeZerg/Info/Description 6=<s val="Lab_Text">樣本嘗試著要脫逃。我在營養液中檢驗出了多種新的酸性物質。時間久了，它們將會擠爆容器。我在想或許可問問指揮官雷諾，看能不能派幾個陸戰隊員駐守在這？我想應該不可能，他會直接摧毀它。我目前還未能從它身上發現什麼。<n/><n/>新發現！我試驗性的給了一些組織高濃度的Σ輻射後它們便瘋狂的扭動，減緩了它們的成長速度。要在戰場上釋放如此大量的輻射射不是一件簡單的事，但很可能是值得的。<n/><n/>另一項突破，但這也讓我害怕。我從不斷的研究著大腦組織中的 DNA，追尋回數千年前之前，將蟲族主宰的染色體分離了出來。雖然不足以複製主宰，但我可以從這些基因中深入瞭解它是怎樣控制蟲族的。</s> /// <s val="Lab_Text">The sample is trying to escape. I've detected several new acids in the nutrient solution. Over time, they will crack the tank. I wonder if Commander Raynor can post some marines down here? No; he'll want to destroy it. I haven't learned everything I can from this thing yet.<n/><n/>Breakthrough. I dosed some tissue with concentrated sigma radiation, and it slowed growth and movement severely. It would take a lot of work to safely deploy that much radiation on the battlefield, but it might be worth it.<n/><n/>Another breakthrough, and this one scares me. I mapped my way through the DNA of some brain tissue, peering back thousands of years, and I isolated the strain from which the zerg Overmind was derived. Not enough to clone the Overmind, but I could follow this strand to gain insight into how it controlled the zerg.</s>

ConversationState/LabResearch/ResearchP1_1=高能電容器 /// Ultra-Capacitors

ConversationState/LabResearch/ResearchZ2_1/Info/Description=<s val="ResearchDescSummary_Zerg">- 指揮中心可以升級為行星要塞<n/>- 升級後將獲得額外的裝甲值及雙聯伊百克加農砲<n/>- 行星要塞無法升空</s><n/><n/><s val="ResearchDescription_Zerg">我們現在可以為指揮中心加裝雙聯伊百克加農砲和更堅韌的裝甲。注意，這項名為「行星要塞」的升級必須在擁有指揮中心後才可執行。<n/><n/>另外要注意的是，升級為行星要塞的指揮中心是無法升空的，它的阿特拉斯級推進器無法負荷這額外的重量。</s> /// <s val="ResearchDescSummary_Zerg">- Command Center can upgrade to a Planetary Fortress.<n/>- Upgrade grants extra armor and the Twin Ibiks Cannon.<n/>- A Planetary Fortress cannot lift off.</s><n/><n/><s val="ResearchDescription_Zerg">We can now outfit the Command Center with the Twin Ibiks Cannon and additional structure plating. Please note that this upgrade, nicknamed the Planetary Fortress, must be triggered after the Command Center has been built.<n/><n/>Also note that a Command Center that has been upgraded to a Planetary Fortress can no longer lift off because the added weight is far too much for the Command Center's Atlas boosters.</s>

ConversationState/LabResearch/ResearchZ2_2/Info/Description=<s val="ResearchDescSummary_Zerg">- 火焰砲台<n/>- 造成範圍傷害<n/>- 在非戰鬥狀態會自動隱藏<n/><n/><s val="ResearchDescription_Zerg">這種砲台可噴出致命的火焰，適合用來抵禦敵方單位一波波的攻勢。它在非戰鬥狀態會自動隱藏在地下，誘使敵人進入攻擊距離後再以團團的火焰將其包圍。<n/><n/>蟲族可以遁地偷襲的特性讓無數的人類士兵們葬送於牠們的魔爪之下，新型的地獄砲台可讓牠們也嘗嘗這種滋味。</s> /// <s val="ResearchDescSummary_Zerg">- Flame turret.<n/>- Does massive area damage.<n/>- Conceals itself when not in combat.<n/><n/><s val="ResearchDescription_Zerg">This turret fires a deadly wall of flame that is ideal for holding off large waves of enemy units. The turret also conceals itself beneath the ground when out of combat, luring unsuspecting enemies into its field of fire.<n/><n/>The Zerg's ability to burrow has allowed them to massacre countless Terran soldiers in deadly ambushes. The new Perdition Turret should help even the score.</s>

This massive transport can carry entire armies and unload them at record speeds.<n/><n/>The Hercules will also eject Survival Pods if shot down. Ejected occupants will sustain damage, but most would agree that injury is preferable to death.</s>

Now our specialist units can use their abilities the moment they hit the battlefield, and they can store more energy when idle for long periods of time.<n/><n/>Specialist units are units that use energy, such as the Medic, Ghost, and Wraith.</s>

ConversationState/LabResearch/ResearchZ4_2/Info/Description=<s val="ResearchDescSummary_Zerg">- 船艦和載具可緩慢地回復生命值</s><n/><n/><s val="ResearchDescription_Zerg">我們的船艦和載具的結構現在是由一種名為活性生化鋼鐵的原料所製成。這種原料可使用內有的奈米機械人，緩慢地修復載具受到的任何傷害。<n/><n/>雖然修復的速度比使用傳統的太空工程車修復慢得多，但若是在缺乏太空工程車的情況下，這將是決定單位生死的關鍵。</s> /// <s val="ResearchDescSummary_Zerg">- Ships and vehicles slowly regenerate life.</s><n/><n/><s val="ResearchDescription_Zerg">Our ship and vehicle hulls are now made from a material called Regenerative Bio-Steel. This material uses internal Nanobots to slowly repair any damage the hull sustains.<n/><n/>While this regeneration process is much slower than conventional SCV repairs, it can be the difference between life and death if no SCVs are available.</s>

ConversationState/LabResearch/ResearchZ5_2/Info/Description=<s val="ResearchDescSummary_Zerg">- 防禦性建築<n/>- 降低鄰近蟲族的移動和攻擊速度<n/>- 持續性效果</s><n/><n/><s val="ResearchDescription_Zerg">地球聯合理事會的研究報告中指出，高濃度的西格瑪幅射可將蟲族的移動和反應速度降低至原本的50%。<n/><n/>幽能干擾器可不斷地釋放效果涵蓋廣大範圍的西格瑪幅射線，使它在防禦大量蟲群時成為我方不可或缺的基地防禦裝置。</s> /// <s val="ResearchDescSummary_Zerg">- Defensive structure.<n/>- Slows movement and attack speeds of nearby Zerg.<n/>- Constant effect.</s><n/><n/><s val="ResearchDescription_Zerg">Studies conducted by the United Earth Directorate have shown that concentrated doses of sigma radiation can slow Zerg movement and reaction speeds by as much as 50%. <n/><n/>The Psi Disrupter has been developed to constantly emit sigma rays in a large area of effect, making it an essential base defense when facing a large Zerg force.</s>

Kill all Virophages to stop them from spreading the Infestation further.

Bunkers can be <c val="FFFF00">Salvaged</c> to return their <c val="FFFF00">Mineral</c> cost if they are no longer needed.

ConversationState/StoryTips/Zeratul04_Mothership/Info/Description=神族艦隊旗艦：<c val="FFFF00">聖母艦</c>是神族艦隊中最大型的船艦。具有極為強大的技能，像是<c val="FFFF00">群體召喚</c>和<c val="FFFF00">漩渦</c>，還具有使附近地面單位和建築進入<c val="FFFF00">匿蹤</c>狀態的能力。聖母艦可以攻擊地面及空中單位。戰場上一次只能有一台聖母艦。若<c val="FFFF00">亞坦尼斯</c>陣亡，可在<c val="FFFF00">星核</c>躍傳另一艘聖母艦。 /// Protoss fleet leader -- A <c val="FFFF00">Mothership </c>is the largest vessel in the Protoss fleet. It has extremely powerful abilities like <c val="FFFF00">Mass Recall</c> and <c val="FFFF00">Vortex</c> as well as the ability to <c val="FFFF00">Cloak</c> nearby ground units and structures. A Mothership can target both ground and air units. There can only be one Mothership on the battlefield at a time. Should <c val="FFFF00">Artanis</c> fall, another Mothership can be warped in at the <c val="FFFF00">Nexus</c>.

You can warp in more Phoenixes at the <c val="FFFF00">Stargate</c>.

This beam continually increases its power as it attacks. The beam decreases in power if it is not firing. You can warp in more Void Rays at the <c val="FFFF00">Stargate</c>.
